function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear relation between environmental contamination and clinical infection","Impact":"Difficulty in determining the transmission route of the virus","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to clarify the relation and implementing strict environmental and hand hygiene procedures","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, individuals in the built environment","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential transmission route through stool viral shedding","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission through fecal-oral route","Mitigation":"Implementing proper sanitation and hygiene measures, and raising awareness about the potential transmission route","Technologies":"Sanitation technologies, public health education tools","People":"Public, individuals in the built environment","Owner":"Public health organizations, sanitation agencies, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate decontamination measures for air outlets and equipment","Impact":"Risk of viral contamination from air exhaust outlets and equipment","Mitigation":"Improving decontamination measures and ventilation systems, conducting regular maintenance of equipment","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, ventilation technology, maintenance tools","People":"People in the built environment, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance teams, ventilation system manufacturers"}]}
